about: I am deeply enthusiastic about coding and take immense pleasure in working alongside a dynamic, multi-disciplinary team where their creativity can spur me to bring out my best work. During my free time, I enjoy the company of my beloved family and friends. Ultimately, I cherish a relaxed environment where I can enjoy a hearty laugh over some great jokes.

work_experience.description:
As the lead developer for the Android projects, I am responsible for its development and direction. In addition, I conducted an analysis of the mobile department's development process and worked with a colleague on the iOS team to restructure the department.

Through this process, we implemented improvements to the development process such as modularization of components, and continuous integration and distribution processes.
responsibilities: Restructuring internal and external SDKs for use in several projects;
Managing internal continuous integration and distribution processes;

work_experience.description:
As the Mobile Team Leader for both Android and iOS development, I was responsible for coordinating with other departments at BeatStars to ensure seamless integration of mobile development efforts.

In addition to leading the development of the BeatStars Marketplace for Android and iOS, I was maintaining and updating previously released apps while keeping abreast of the latest technologies and trends in the market.
responsibilities: Development of native apps for iOS and Android;
Defining the technologies to use in Android and iOS;
Serving as a UX design consultant;

work_experience.description: I developed native Android and iOS applications for several type of business. Among them multimedia, healthcare, education and others. I also developed hybrid apps in Ionic platform and created native plugins to be used in other projects.
responsibilities: Development of native apps for iOS and Android;
Development of hybrid apps in Ionic Platform;
Manage App Build in Markets (AppStore and Google Play);
Communication with the Team and Clients;

work_experience.description: I started the mobile department in the company and I was responsible for the Android development. I defined the standards to use in Android development and develop several applications for Smartphone and Tablet.
responsibilities: Defining technologies to use in Android application development, web, and smart TV;
Communication with the team and clients;

work_experience.description:
I entered in a competition startWeb 2013 with more 3 colleagues, where we design and concept an idea. We were one of the 3 teams select and we got a money incentive to develop our idea.

Our idea was do educational games for children from ages 3 to 6 and gather several informations through the games to share the kids progress with the parents and the teachers.
responsibilities: Design and concept of educational games for children from ages 3 to 6;
Development of mobile and web apps (CMS, API's and webservices to support several apps);
